overview: A middling cemetery caretaker Pido (Rommel Mahinay) is a happy go lucky person and perceives life as it is, taking everything lightly and contented with what he had. Fate starts to get bristly when his wife dies and later stricken by illness because of being an alcoholic. With no one to help him, and his illness getting worst, the solitary Pido struggled every day to live his lonely life. As he grows weaker, and knowing it was only a matter of time before he dies, Pido decided to end his misery by burying himself alive.
title: Sepulturero
